xboxlive_stats_get_stat: This function can be used to retrieve a single stat value from the stat manager for a given user. You supply the user ID as returned by (for example) the function xboxlive_get_user(), and then the stat string as defined when you created it using the one of the xboxlive_stats_set_stat_* functions. The return value can be either a string or a real (depending on the stat being checked) or the GML constant undefined if the stat does not exist or there has been an error.
